import Modal from '../Modal' import UpdateTransactionModal from '../UpdateTransactionModal' import './index.css' const TransactionItem = props => { const { transactionDetails, onClickDeleteItem, show, showModal, hideModal, } = props const {date, type, amount, name, category, id} = transactionDetails // Create a Date object from the timestamp const dateObj = new Date(date) const options = { day: 'numeric', month: 'short', hour: 'numeric', minute: 'numeric', hour12: true, } const onClickDelete = () => { onClickDeleteItem(id) } const formattedDate = dateObj.toLocaleString('en-US', options) console.log(formattedDate) const isTrue = type === 'debit' || type === 'dedit' ? 'red-2' : 'green-1' const isDebit = type === 'debit' || type === 'dedit' ? ( ) : ( ) const onClickUpdate = () => return (
  • {isDebit}

    {name}

    {category}

    {formattedDate}

    {isTrue === 'red-2' ? (

    -${amount}

    ) : (

    +${amount}

    )}

    Are you sure you want to Delete?

    This transaction will be deleted immediately. You can’t undo this action.

    • ) } export default TransactionItem
